item.title: Mainpage
item.description: YIMIN CHEN Personal Information Name Yimin Chen Nationality People’s Republic of China Education Bachelor of Science Xiamen University, Xiamen, Fujian, China, 2012~2016, Applied Mathematics. Doctor of Science Tsinghua University, Bejing, China, 2016~2022, Differential Geometry. (Supervisor: Prof. Haizhong Li) Cooperation Research Albert-Ludwigs-Univesität Freiburg, Freiburg im Breisgau, Germany, 2019-2020, Differential Geometry and Geometric Analysis. (Mentor: Prof. Guofang Wang). Employment Post-doc Researcher. Pusan National University, Busan, South Korea. 2022~Now. (Mentor: Prof. Juncheol Pyo).

Publications and Preprints [1]: Chen, Y., Li, H. (2022). The stability of hypersurfaces with constant shifted k-th mean curvature. Mathematische Nachrichten, 295 (1), 58-70. [2]: Chen, Y., Hu, Y., Li, H. (2022). Geometric inequalities for free boundary hypersur- faces in a ball, Annals of Global Analysis and Geometry, 62(1), 33-45. [3]: Chen, Y., Pyo, J. (2022). Some rigidity results on compact hypersurfaces with capillary boundary in the hyperbolic space, Arxiv preprint, arxiv: 2206.
